title: The Napping house
brief_description: The tale of a family and the snugly heap they make on a drowsy day. The repetitive text invites viewers to join in as sleepy bodies accumulate on a sagging bed. All is calm until a fateful itch throws the pyramid into chaos. From the book by Audrey Wood.
